00027 #ifndef MESQUITE_MESH_IMPL_TAGS_HPP
00028 #define MESQUITE_MESH_IMPL_TAGS_HPP
00029 
00030 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00031 #include "MeshInterface.hpp"

00033 #include <vector>
00034 
00035 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00036 
00037   struct TagDescription {
00038       // The VTK attribute type the data was read from, or NONE if not VTK data.
00039       // This property is kept only so that when a vtk file is read and subseqquently
00040       // written, it can be preserved for other potential readers that actually care
00041       // about it.
00042     enum VtkType { NONE = 0, SCALAR, COLOR, VECTOR, NORMAL, TEXTURE, TENSOR, FIELD };
00043 
00044     std::string name;   
00045     Mesh::TagType type;     
00046     VtkType vtkType;        
00047     size_t size;            
00048     std::string member; 
00049 
00050     inline TagDescription( std::string n, 
00051                            Mesh::TagType t, 
00052                            VtkType v, 
00053                            size_t s,
00054                            std::string m )
00055       : name(n), type(t), vtkType(v), size(s), member(m) {}
00056 
00057     inline TagDescription( )
00058       : type(Mesh::BYTE), vtkType(NONE), size(0) {}
00059 
00060     inline bool operator==(const TagDescription& o) const
00061       { return name == o.name && type == o.type && vtkType == o.vtkType && size == o.size; }
00062     inline bool operator!=(const TagDescription& o) const
00063       { return name != o.name || type != o.type || vtkType != o.vtkType || size != o.size; }
00064   };
00065 
00073 class MeshImplTags {
00074   public:
00075 
00076   ~MeshImplTags() { clear(); }
00077 
00081   struct TagData  {
00082 
00084     const TagDescription desc;
00085 
00087     void* elementData;
00088 
00090     size_t elementCount;
00091 
00093     void* vertexData;
00094     
00096     size_t vertexCount;
00097 
00099     void* defaultValue;
00100 
00108     inline TagData( const std::string& name, 
00109              Mesh::TagType type, unsigned length,
00110              void* default_val = 0,
00111              TagDescription::VtkType vtk_type = TagDescription::NONE,
00112              const std::string& field_member = "")
00113       : desc(name, type, vtk_type, length*size_from_tag_type(type), field_member),
00114         elementData(0), elementCount(0),
00115         vertexData(0), vertexCount(0), 
00116         defaultValue(default_val) {}
00117 
00121     inline TagData( const TagDescription& descr )
00122       : desc(descr), elementData(0), elementCount(0),
00123         vertexData(0), vertexCount(0),
00124         defaultValue(0) {}
00125 
00126     ~TagData();
00127   };
00128   
00130   static size_t size_from_tag_type( Mesh::TagType type );
00131 
00133   void clear();
00134

00137

00193   
00198   class TagIterator 
00199   {
00200     public:
00201       TagIterator() : tags(0), index(0) {}
00202       TagIterator( MeshImplTags* d, size_t i ) : tags(d), index(i) {}
00203       size_t operator*() const  { return index+1; }
00204       TagIterator operator++();
00205       TagIterator operator--();
00206       TagIterator operator++(int);
00207       TagIterator operator--(int);
00208       bool operator==(TagIterator other) const { return index == other.index; }
00209       bool operator!=(TagIterator other) const { return index != other.index; }
00210     private:
00211       MeshImplTags* tags;
00212       size_t index;
00213   };
00214   TagIterator tag_begin();
00215   TagIterator tag_end()   { return TagIterator(this,tagList.size()); }
00216 
00218   bool tag_has_vertex_data( size_t index, MsqError& err ) ;
00220   bool tag_has_element_data( size_t index, MsqError& err ) ;

00222   private:
00223 
00224   friend class MeshImplTags::TagIterator;  
00225   
00226     std::vector<TagData*> tagList;
